description: Extension to add support for vscode and npm tasks.
displayName: Task view support for VS Code
config.taskView.autoDetect: Controls whether tasks should be automatically detected.
config.taskView.packageManager: The package manager used to run npm scripts.
config.taskView.exclude: Configure glob patterns for folders that should be excluded from automatic script detection.
config.taskView.tasksExplorerAction: The default click action used in the scripts explorer: `open` or `run`, the default is `open`.
config.taskView.fetchOnlinePackageInfo: Fetch data from https://registry.npmjs.org and https://registry.bower.io to provide auto-completion and information on hover features on npm dependencies.
taskview.parseError: VSCode task detection: failed to parse the file {0}
taskdef.path: The path to the folder of the tasks.json file that provides the script. Can be omitted.
view.name: Tasks
